title: Champion Concept - Dex, Tomorrow's Soldier
body:
Yes, I know, it's another one of these champion concepts, but hear me out, this one's got all new mechanics.

Basically he loses accuracy and gains attack speed, depending upon how often you use you abilities while in combat.

Read the document and tell me what you think, sorry if it looks a bit confusing.

replies.body: Bump, simply coz I think this needs a bit more attention.
